name: Nash Racing: Battle
description:
Gameplay:


Player participate different races at different tracks and locations with buggy car which has weapons. After race starts player can collect different weapons around tracks. There are 2 different weapons: Rocket launcher and mortar weapons. Also player can collect mines and drop them. Player car has 8 Ai opponents. Player can collect more health and also shield to protect his buggy car. Player also need avoid fire mines at tracks which destroy player car. Every track has also 1 hidden star which give steam achievement. Races are 2-3 laps long and player can win if he is first at finish or last movable car at track

FEATURES:

- 2-3 laps races
- buggy cars with weapons: rocket launcher and mortar
- 10 tracks
- Collect start to achieve Steam Achievements
- AI opponents
